CREATE TABLE wp_quiz ( id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, quiz_title varchar(255) NOT NULL, question_number smallint(5) NOT NULL, campaign_time varchar(255) NOT NULL, popup_time varchar(255) NOT NULL, quiz_category varchar(255) NOT NULL, quiz_location varchar(255) NOT NULL, quiz_hardness varchar(255) NOT NULL, quiz_type varchar(255) NOT NULL, reward json NOT NULL, reward_message json NOT NULL, live_status smallint(5) NOT NULL, link longtext NOT NULL, time datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
